title: Huge lag after this patch
body: I don't know what to do, I have literally done everything riot has in their support section, but i'm getting huge lag spikes in game.  Is anyone else having issues with this and does anyone know of something I can do that isn't listed in their support section?

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing packet loss here.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can know for sure, and the results should also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know what you find.

I've been getting lag but has nothing to do with the patch.  For some reason my internet (in the Bay Area, CA) is having horrible lag to the Riot servers.  Internet seems to be working in general but some connection along the way sucks.

I don't know what Riot did with this last patch, but I have seen (including myself) a LOT of issues with client, FPS drops mid game, and crashes that didn't happen like this before the last update. I don't know why the hell they are NOT widely addressing these issues. Guess they care more about having fun in China then fixing the game for the masses.

(You know how hard it is to play a skill shot based champ and ur FPS (not ping/ms) goes from 70 to 11? Worse then the game lagging out, even though it looks like ur lagging!)
Same, I've been getting stupid lag spikes all throughout my games, like characters will perform actions and I won't see the results until seconds later.
